paper_abstract: We provide necessary and sufficient conditions for the existence of solutions of G(1) Hermite interpolation problem by spatial PH cubics. To deal with the cases where multiple solutions exist, we also provide a selection scheme to choose one "good" interpolant curve based on the concept of analytic continuation. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Solvability of G(1) Hermite interpolation by spatial Pythagorean-hodograph cubics and its selection scheme
